verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1095>Belteshazzar;<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H571>true,<s%> even a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6635>warfare:<s%> and he <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and had <S%H998>understanding<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1840>I,<s%> Daniel, was <S%H56>mourning<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H7620>weeks.<s%>

I <S%H398>ate<s%> no <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> neither <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> nor <S%H3196>wine<s%> into my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> neither did I <S%H5480>anoint<s%> myself at <S%H5480>all,<s%> until <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled.<s%>

In the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> as I was by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> which is <S%H2313>Hiddekel,<s%>

I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H259>behold,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> whose <S%H4975>thighs<s%> were <S%H2296>adorned<s%> with pure <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H210>Uphaz:<s%>

his <S%H1472>body<s%> also was like the <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> and his <S%H6440>face<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> as <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H3940>torches,<s%> and his <S%H2220>arms<s%> and his <S%H4772>feet<s%> <S%H5869>like<s%> <S%H7044>burnished<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words<s%> like the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude.<s%>

<S%H1840>I,<s%> Daniel, alone <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4759>vision;<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> who were with me <S%H7200>didn't<s%> see the <S%H4759>vision;<s%> <S%H61>but<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2731>quaking<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H1272>them,<s%> and they fled to hide <S%H2244>themselves.<s%>

So I was left <S%H7604>alone,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4759>vision,<s%> and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> no <S%H3581>strength<s%> in <S%H1935>me;<s%> for my comeliness was <S%H2015>turned<s%> in me into <S%H4889>corruption,<s%> and I <S%H6113>retained<s%> no <S%H3581>strength.<s%>

Yet <S%H8085>heard<s%> I the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words;<s%> and when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H1697>words,<s%> then was I fallen into a deep <S%H7290>sleep<s%> on my <S%H6440>face,<s%> with my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
<S%H3027>Behold,<s%> a hand <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H5128>me,<s%> which set me on my <S%H1290>knees<s%> and on the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1840>me,<s%> Daniel, you <S%H376>man<s%> greatly <S%H2532>beloved,<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H5975>you,<s%> and stand <S%H5977>upright;<s%> for am I now <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1696>you.<s%> When he had spoken this <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H5975>me,<s%> I stood <S%H7460>trembling.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>me,<s%> Don't be afraid, <S%H1840>Daniel;<s%> for from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H995>understand,<s%> and to <S%H6031>humble<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard:<s%> and I have <S%H935>come<s%> for your <S%H1697>words<s%>' sake.

But the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> <S%H5975>withstood<s%> me <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H4317>but,<s%> behold, Michael, <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3498>me:<s%> and I remained there <S%H681>with<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia.<s%>

Now I have <S%H935>come<s%> to make you <S%H995>understand<s%> what shall <S%H7136>happen<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> for the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is yet for many <S%H3117>days:<s%>
and when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to me according to these <S%H1697>words,<s%> I <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and was <S%H481>mute.<s%>

<S%H1823>Behold,<s%> one in the likeness of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H8193>lips:<s%> then I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him who <S%H5975>stood<s%> before <S%H113>me,<s%> my lord, by reason of the <S%H4759>vision<s%> my <S%H6735>sorrows<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> on <S%H6113>me,<s%> and I retain no <S%H3581>strength.<s%>

For <S%H1963>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of this my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> with this my <S%H113>lord?<s%> for as for <S%H6258>me,<s%> immediately there <S%H5975>remained<s%> no <S%H3581>strength<s%> in <S%H5397>me,<s%> neither was there breath left in <S%H7604>me.<s%>
Then there <S%H5060>touched<s%> me <S%H3254>again<s%> one like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> and he strengthened <S%H2388>me.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Greatly <S%H2532>beloved<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid: <S%H7965>peace<s%> be to <S%H2388>you,<s%> be strong, <S%H2388>yes,<s%> be strong." When he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H2388>me,<s%> I was strengthened, and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>speak;<s%> for you have strengthened <S%H2388>me.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> why I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7725>you?<s%> Now I will return to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia.<s%> When I go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> <S%H8269>behold,<s%> the prince of <S%H3120>Greece<s%> shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H61>But<s%> I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you that which is <S%H7559>inscribed<s%> in the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of <S%H571>truth:<s%> and there is <S%H259>none<s%> who <S%H2388>holds<s%> with me against <S%H4317>these,<s%> but Michael your <S%H8269>prince.<s%>"
